review: ** ** *** ** *** **** ******* very caring. If you think of meeting this DR he is best person for your child. He is great and May god bless him with long life and treat and cure more people.

Very Cordial, Patience, attentive and care for both child & Parents.   Had very long term care for my child with his utmost care and guidance.  My child is 100% alright now and grown as adult.  Thanks a ton Dr. (Father of Anil)

I visited carnary health center to meet dr prahalad as per appointment...I waited for 3 hrs dr didn't turned up and the people in the hospital couldn't reach him on his mobile nor he informed hospital about his delay .... finally after waiting so many hrs he canceled all his appointments...almost 30 kids with parents wasted their time...would never recommend him...
